amendment.description: To require the Food and Drug Administration to publish certain annual reports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1026 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1026 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S5699-5705) To require the Food and Drug Administration to publish certain annual reports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1026 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1026 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Feingold.
